Setting : University Teaching Hospital , Faculty Practice Subjects : Male female patient age 18-40 diagnosed symptomatic patellofemoral pain syndrome ( PFPS ) meet inclusion exclusion criterion . Approximately 68 subject enrol base power analysis sample size estimation .
